definition: deed/past achievement/important event of the past

sentences.english: Every time another episode of Castaway was aired, it got worse.
sentences.chinese: 每看到一次电视里播放的漂流者事迹，情况就会更糟。

sentences.english: Name one thing Benjamin Franklin is famous for.
sentences.chinese: 富兰克林其中一项着名的事迹。

sentences.english: Their moving story will be forever branded on the brains of us, our children and grandchildren.
sentences.chinese: 他们的感人事迹将永远被我们以及子孙铭记。

sentences.english: Their various adventures are exciting, but perfectly plausible .
sentences.chinese: 他们的冒险事迹真够刺激，可完全是合情合理的。

sentences.english: The heroic deeds of the people's soldiers are too numerous to enumerate.
sentences.chinese: 人民子弟兵的事迹举不胜举。

sentences.english: The tragedy prompted countless acts of heroism.
sentences.chinese: 这悲剧激发了无数的英勇事迹。

sentences.english: This story tells about the beginning of the life track of great wizard and mage Faust.
sentences.chinese: 故事讲述的是欧洲中世界的传说人物浮士德的事迹。

sentences.english: Having been recognized by lodgers for excellent hospitality services or good service practices.
sentences.chinese: 接待旅客服务周全获有好评，或有优良事迹者。

sentences.english: The national hero, Zhang Huangyan s deeds have definite historical records.
sentences.chinese: 民族英雄张煌言蒙难南田事迹，史志早有记载。

sentences.english: All this throws new light on the study of Chen Chen's life story and his poetry.
sentences.chinese: 这些都为研究陈忱的生平事迹和诗歌提供了新的材料。

sentences.english: She doesn’t tell me one ofthose stories about the old ancestors.
sentences.chinese: 她不再和我述说我们以色列人先祖的事迹了。

sentences.english: Thee soldier's brave deeds brought him honor and glory.
sentences.chinese: 士兵的勇敢髧事迹为他带来了荣耀和赞美。

sentences.english: I hope the deeds like female schoolmaster will disappear in china.
sentences.chinese: 我希望像女校长的事迹会消失。

sentences.english: Those hooks will snap the people away according to their deeds.
sentences.chinese: 这些联系将单元人民远离根据他们的感人事迹。

sentences.english: Plato wove historical fact into literary myth.
sentences.chinese: 柏拉图把历史事迹编写成文学神话。

sentences.english: However, his life story is seldom discovered in the historical documents.
sentences.chinese: 可是他的生平事迹却很少见诸史料记载。

definition: to abandon self for others (idiom); to sacrifice oneself to help the people/altruism
to record sb's achievements in writing/to write a biography enhancing the subject's image
lit. to erect a stele and write a biography (idiom)/to monumentalize/to glorify/to sing the praises of
lit. you can sing or you can cry (idiom); fig. deeply moving/happy and sad/inspiring and tragic
